verse.unicode: ਐਸੀ ਭਾਤਿ ਹੇਰ ਕੈ ਨਿਬੇਰ ਦੀਨੇ ਸੂਰ ਸਬੈ ਆਪ ਬ੍ਰਿਜਰਾਜ ਤਾ ਕੇ ਉਠੇ ਗੁਨ ਗਾਇ ਕੈ ॥੧੫੯੫॥

en.bdb: After wounding the king, he himself was wounded and then fell down, in this way, he searched for warriors and destroyed them, seeing his bravery, Krishna himself began to praise him.1595.
